title: Axiom Constraint Verification Matrix (ACVM) Configuration
description: Validated configuration settings for the ACVM governance system. Refined to enhance traceability and modular constraint management, supporting structured constraints and dynamic severity levels.

system_metadata.description: System-level governance metadata, versioning, and constraint profile identification.

schema_version.description: Semantic Version identifier for the ACVM schema structure itself.

acvm_profile_id.description: Identifier linking to the official ACVM profile registry (e.g., P-M02).

last_updated_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last governance configuration modification.

performance_constraints.description: GAX I Constraints: Operational throughput and efficiency thresholds (Soft/Hard constraints).

min_throughput.description: Minimum required operational throughput constraint configuration.

ops_sec.description: Minimum required operational throughput, measured in operations per second.

severity.description: Determines if violation halts execution or merely logs a telemetry event.

security_constraints.description: GAX II Constraints: Integrity and environmental boundary checks.

environmental_boundary.description: Configuration for enforcement of the environmental boundary policy.

policy_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (SHA-256 required) of the current enforced boundary policy.

source_uri.description: URI from which the canonical boundary policy document is retrieved for auditing.

compliance_limits.description: GAX III Constraints: Structural compliance and violation tolerance limits.

max_count.description: Maximum tolerable integer threshold for structural policy violations.

enforcement_mode.description: Operational mode for handling compliance failures (e.g., silent logging vs. hard shutdown).
